{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17644v1", "title": "Bounded diagonal orbits in homogeneous spaces over function fields", "summary": "This paper is about topological rigidity of diagonal group actions on the
homogeneous $\SL_4\big(\F(\!(t^{-1})\!)\big)/\SL_4(\F[t])$ where $\F$ is a
finite field of characteristic $3$. We show that there is a non-closed
relatively compact orbit of the diagonal group.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS", "published": "2025-04-24T15:14:10Z"}
